1272210.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Adventurers League 09-14 The Vast Emptiness of Grace
1272210.description:
D&D Adventurers League 09-14 The Vast Emptiness of Grace

The divine spark has been returned to Verwyyr and Raskamedies and the time has come to return to the Material plane in search of an ancient artifact once belonging to Ilmater himself. Beneath the holy city of Elturel lay a reliquary--the Dolorous Adytum. What dark secrets lay within? It's time to find out. Part Three of the
Call for Aid series of adventures.
A Four-to-Six-Hour Adventure for 11th through 16th Level Characters (APL 13)
Converted by:  
Danny Stratton
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Recommended: D&D Basic Rules, D&D Player's Handbook or D&D Character Customization Pack, D&D Monster Manual
